summary: The bill, titled the Strengthen Wood Products Supply Chain Act of 2025, amends the Lacey Act regarding the detention of plants suspected of violating it. It sets deadlines for the Secretary of the Interior to release or issue a notice of detention for imported plants. The bill details requirements for detention notices, testing procedures, transport of plants under bond, and final determination timelines. It also provides a process for importers to protest detention decisions and pursue court action. The Secretary is mandated to create regulations to implement the bill.
